publisher.name: Bath and North East Somerset Council

buyer.name: Bath and North East Somerset Council

tender.description:
Bath & North East Somerset Council are looking to commission a service that will offer health and social care services to people living with HIV in BANES and those close to them (i.e. their families, friends or carers). We are really interested in receiving views and comments from stakeholders about the service specification to help us shape the future service and the procurement process prior to going out to tender. B&NES Council are keen for providers to think about the options of linking with other local providers to bid as a partnership.
 
Please return any comments via email to Katie_pink@bathnes.gov.uk by Friday 2nd January 2015.

Suppliers interested in this opportunity should express their interest by clicking on the login and register interest button below.

New users to the system must register first to obtain a user name and password before returning to this opportunity. Please refer to the suppliers guide Visiting Site for the First Time by clicking the Help button.
Once suppliers have expressed their interest they can access the procurement documentation from My Opportunities on the home page. 
Upon registering interest and commencing the tendering process tenderers must not approach any member of the Authority directly or indirectly in relation to the tender. If clarification is required regarding this tender, all questions must be submitted via discussions on the Supplying the South West portal from where the tender documents were downloaded.
tender.title: HIV Support Service
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
